name: ideas (to) shun
description:
"ideas (to) shun" is a short collection of 6 poems and 1 short meditation by Quinn K., created since the beginning of 2022.

THE PROCEEDS FROM THIS ZINE WILL BE USED TO ALLEVIATE DEBT CAUSED BY INDEPENDENT GAME DEVELOPMENT

Content warnings: Child abandonment, death, dissociation, suicidal ideation, references to religiously motivated discrimination
